title: Anchor Reliability Scoring Algorithm Enhancement
description: Enhance the anchor reliability scoring algorithm with machine learning to predict anchor performance based on historical data, transaction patterns, and network conditions.

title: Payment Success Prediction Model Enhancement
description: Improve the existing payment success prediction model with additional features: time-of-day patterns, network congestion, historical corridor performance, and anchor status.

title: Asset Velocity Metrics and Analysis
description: Track and analyze asset velocity - how quickly assets move through the network. Measure transaction frequency, holder turnover, and circulation patterns.

title: Network Congestion Indicator
description: Real-time network congestion indicator showing transaction queue depth, fee levels, and ledger close times. Help users time their transactions optimally.

title: Anchor Downtime Tracker and Alerting
description: Track anchor uptime/downtime with historical records. Alert users when anchors go offline or experience issues. Provide uptime SLA tracking.

title: Liquidity Fragmentation Analysis
description: Analyze liquidity fragmentation across the network. Identify where liquidity is concentrated, fragmented, or missing. Provide recommendations for liquidity providers.

title: Market Maker Performance Metrics
description: Track and analyze market maker performance on Stellar DEX. Measure spread consistency, quote depth, uptime, and profitability indicators.

title: Settlement Time Distribution Analysis
description: Detailed analysis of settlement time distributions across corridors. Show percentiles (p50, p95, p99), identify outliers, and track improvements over time.

title: Failed Payment Root Cause Analysis
description: Analyze failed payments to identify root causes. Categorize failures (insufficient balance, no trust, path not found, etc.) and provide actionable insights.

title: Corridor Health Forecasting
description: Use time-series forecasting to predict corridor health trends. Alert users to potential degradation before it happens.

title: Customizable Dashboard Widgets
description: Allow users to customize their dashboard by adding, removing, and rearranging widgets. Save layouts per user.

title: Advanced Filtering and Search
description: Implement advanced filtering and search across all data tables. Support multiple filters, saved searches, and complex queries.

title: Bookmark Favorite Corridors and Anchors
description: Allow users to bookmark favorite corridors and anchors for quick access. Display bookmarks in sidebar and dashboard.

title: Export Charts as Images
description: Add ability to export charts and visualizations as PNG/SVG images for use in reports and presentations.

title: Mobile-Responsive Improvements
description: Comprehensive mobile responsiveness improvements across all pages. Optimize layouts, navigation, and interactions for mobile devices.

title: Keyboard Shortcuts
description: Implement keyboard shortcuts for common actions. Provide shortcut help overlay and customization.

title: Accessibility (WCAG 2.1 AA Compliance)
description: Comprehensive accessibility audit and improvements to meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards. Ensure platform is usable by everyone.

title: Multi-Language Support (i18n)
description: Implement internationalization (i18n) to support multiple languages. Start with English, Spanish, and Chinese.

title: User Preferences Persistence
description: Persist user preferences across sessions including theme, language, dashboard layout, filters, and display options.

title: Corridor Performance Alerts
description: Real-time alerts for corridor performance changes. Notify users when success rates drop, latency increases, or liquidity decreases.

title: Real-Time Notification Center
description: Centralized notification center for all alerts, updates, and system messages. Support read/unread status, filtering, and actions.

title: Interactive Network Graph Visualization
description: Interactive graph visualization showing relationships between anchors, assets, and corridors. Enable exploration of network topology.

title: Time Range Selector Component
description: Reusable time range selector component with presets (24h, 7d, 30d, custom) and date picker. Use across all time-based views.

title: Data Refresh Indicator
description: Visual indicator showing when data was last updated and when next refresh will occur. Manual refresh button.

title: GraphQL API Layer
description: Add GraphQL API layer alongside REST API for more flexible data querying. Enable clients to request exactly the data they need.

title: REST API Rate Limiting per Client
description: Implement per-client rate limiting for REST API to prevent abuse and ensure fair usage.

title: API Key Management System
description: Full API key management system for developers to generate, rotate, and revoke API keys.

title: Webhook Support for Events
description: Allow users to register webhooks for corridor events, anchor status changes, and alerts.

title: Zapier Integration
description: Create Zapier integration to connect Stellar Insights with 5000+ apps.

title: Slack Bot for Alerts
description: Slack bot that sends corridor alerts and anchor notifications to Slack channels.

title: Telegram Bot for Notifications
description: Telegram bot for receiving alerts and querying corridor/anchor status.

title: Email Digest Reports
description: Automated email digest reports with weekly/monthly corridor and anchor performance summaries.

title: Public API Documentation Portal
description: Dedicated API documentation portal with interactive examples, code samples, and playground.

title: API Usage Analytics Dashboard
description: Dashboard showing API usage statistics, popular endpoints, error rates, and performance metrics.

title: Snapshot Contract Upgrade Mechanism
description: Implement safe contract upgrade mechanism for snapshot contract with migration support.

title: Multi-Admin Support for Contracts
description: Support multiple admin addresses for snapshot contract with role-based permissions.

title: Contract Pause/Unpause Functionality
description: Add emergency pause functionality to contracts for security incidents.

title: Snapshot Verification Rewards
description: Reward mechanism for users who verify snapshot hashes match backend data.

title: On-Chain Governance for Parameters
description: On-chain governance system for updating contract parameters through voting.

title: Contract Event Replay System
description: System to replay contract events for rebuilding state or debugging.

title: Snapshot Rollback Protection
description: Prevent snapshot rollback attacks by enforcing monotonic epoch increases.

title: Contract Access Control Lists
description: Fine-grained access control lists for contract functions.

title: Emergency Stop Mechanism
description: Emergency stop mechanism that halts all contract operations in case of critical issues.

title: Contract Upgrade Proposal System
description: Proposal system for contract upgrades with community voting.

title: Kubernetes Deployment Manifests
description: Complete Kubernetes deployment manifests for production deployment.

title: Terraform Infrastructure as Code
description: Terraform modules for provisioning all infrastructure components.

title: CI/CD Pipeline Optimization
description: Optimize CI/CD pipelines for faster builds and deployments.

title: Automated Backup System
description: Automated backup system for database and critical data with retention policies.

title: Disaster Recovery Plan
description: Comprehensive disaster recovery plan with runbooks and procedures.

title: Blue-Green Deployment Strategy
description: Implement blue-green deployment strategy for zero-downtime releases.

title: Database Migration Automation
description: Automated database migration system with version control and rollback.

title: Log Aggregation (ELK Stack)
description: Set up ELK (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana) stack for centralized logging.

title: APM Integration (New Relic/Datadog)
description: Integrate Application Performance Monitoring tool for deep insights.

title: Cost Optimization Analysis
description: Analyze and optimize infrastructure costs with recommendations.

title: Security Audit Preparation
description: Prepare codebase for professional security audit with documentation and threat modeling.

title: GDPR Compliance Features
description: Implement GDPR compliance features including data export, deletion, and consent management.

title: API Request Signing
description: Implement request signing for API calls to prevent tampering and replay attacks.

title: IP Whitelisting for Admin
description: IP whitelisting for admin endpoints to restrict access to trusted networks.

title: Two-Factor Authentication
description: Implement two-factor authentication using TOTP for enhanced security.

title: Session Management System
description: Robust session management with timeout, refresh, and device tracking.

title: Audit Log for Admin Actions
description: Comprehensive audit log for all admin actions with tamper-proof storage.

title: Data Encryption at Rest
description: Encrypt sensitive data at rest using industry-standard encryption.

title: Secrets Management (Vault)
description: Integrate HashiCorp Vault for secure secrets management.

title: Penetration Testing Framework
description: Set up automated penetration testing framework for continuous security validation.
